show_name: The Day I Bought a Star (movie)
other_title: The Day I Bought a Planet
The Day I Cropped a Star
plot: A young boy, tired of the city, escapes into the country. When trying to bring vegetables to the market to sell, his cart breaks down and he exchanges the vegetables for a mystical seed. Returning home he plants the seed in a normal pot—only to find it growing into a planet.
